abstract: The New York Times Company posts third-quarter profit of $15.7 million, with digital subscribers partially offsetting falling advertising revenue.
snippet: Subscribers to its Web site helped The New York Times Company post a third-quarter profit of $15.7 million, partly offsetting falling revenue in every advertising category.
lead_paragraph: Subscribers to its Web site helped The New York Times Company post a third-quarter profit of $15.7 million, partly offsetting falling revenue in every advertising category.

headline.main: Times Co. Reports a Profit, Aided by Digital Subscribers
headline.print_headline: Times Co. Reports a Profit, Aided by Digital Subscribers
headline.seo: The New York Times Company Reports a Profit
